Subject: Fwd: Victim Notification Letters 
Hey IMF will you be in today? I want to discuss the below. 
Thanks 
Forwarded 
message 
From: 
Date: Jul 20, 2020 12:54 PM 
Subject: Victim Notification Letters 
To: 
Cc: 
I  have included a list of clients we represent who I  believe have all spoken with the FBI or were identified as victims in 
the Non-Prosecution Agreement in 2007. Please let me know if any of these names are unfamiliar to you or if you are 
unable to provide a victim notification letter for any of them. 
Claimant First Name I Claimant Last Name 
EFTA00021914

shank you so much for everything you do, 
r
il" T1 
r IL-4 .i. 
EDWARDS 
POTTINGER LLC

tort Lauderdale, Florida 33301 
Direct
